sentences.en: Empower error of nominal diameter is shown in Table 3.
sentences.cn: 圆铜线标称直径的允许偏差符合表3规定.

sentences.en: Empower them to help and be themselves.
sentences.cn: 使他们帮助别人又不改变自己.

sentences.en: Empower your readers — to code better, think differently, or simply choose the right mortgage.
sentences.cn: 鼓励你的读者——写更好的代码, 有不一样的想法 、 或者仅仅只是选择好的贷款.

sentences.en: Empower yourself with knowledge and information.
sentences.cn: 用知识跟资讯来武装自己.

sentences.en: I want to empower the businessman.
It really well will empower you, and give you the strength to take some action.
sentences.cn: 这真的可以极大的鼓励你, 给你力量去做一些事.

sentences.en: Its mission is to empower indiiduals to achiee and maintain optimal health.
sentences.cn: 它的使命是赋予个人实现和保持最佳的健康.

sentences.en: Love and peace is hard to empower with words.
sentences.cn: 提起爱心与和平,我说不出什么绚烂华丽的词语.

sentences.en: Powerful people empower others and encourage others to express themselves openly.
sentences.cn: 具有影响力的人给人以力量,鼓励他人坦诚地表达自己的观点.

sentences.en: So how do you develop beliefs that will empower you?
sentences.cn: 因此,你会怎样引导自己的信念给自己注入力量?

sentences.en: Technology continues to empower both the consumer and seller.
sentences.cn: 技术持续地赋予权力给消费者和卖家.

sentences.en: The army is now empowered to operate on a shoot-to-kill basis.
sentences.cn: 军队现在被授权依据“杀无赦”原则行动。

sentences.en: The Voting Rights Act was needed to empower minority groups.
sentences.cn: 《选举权法案》对于赋予少数民族自主权是必不可少的。

sentences.en: They empower you with the possibility of exercising agency , of discovering mea ning, of making choices.
sentences.cn: 从这个道理上讲,文科 —— 照它的字面意思——才使你们自由.

sentences.en: We trust people, empower them and give them space to develop.
sentences.cn: 我们信任我们的员工, 放手让他们去拼,给他们创造发展的空间.

sentences.en: What I'm trying to do is to empower people, to give them ways to help them get well.
sentences.cn: 我现在努力做的就是帮助人们，引他们过上好日子。

trans.tran_en: to give a person or organization the legal right to do something
